name: agentic-workflows
description: Agentic workflow management system with utility scripts for prompt parsing, workflow validation, and system maintenance

scripts.help:
echo 'Available scripts:
  parse-prompt    - Parse and process task prompts with template variables
  parse-workflow  - Validate workflow definition files
  mirror          - Sync agentic-workflows/ â†” .claude/commands/
  create-commands - Generate command files
  shard-markdown  - Process markdown files
  commit-highlights - Analyze git commit patterns
  citation:validate - Validate citations in markdown files
  citation:ast    - Show AST and extracted data from markdown
  test:citation   - Run citation validation tests'
